p: A total of 53 NPs with reported anti-mycobacterial activity ≤100 mg·mL −1 were selected. All chemical structures were retrieved from the PubChem compound database (NCBI) ( http://www.pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov). The crystal structures and respective controls of ClpP1P2 (PDB ID: 4U0G) [ 8], DprE1 (PDB ID: 6HEZ) [ 67], InhA (PDB ID: 1ENY) [ 14], KasA (PDB ID: 2WGE) [ 16], PanK type 1 (PDB ID: 4BFT) [ 68], PknB (PDB ID: 2FUM) [ 18] and Pks13 (PDB ID: 5V3X) [ 10] were retrieved from the RCSB Protein Data Bank (PDB) database ( https://www.rcsb.org).
